name: Stovetop Mac and Cheese
author: Stephanie Melchione
description: This Creamy Stovetop Mac and Cheese is the BEST 30-minute meal for a busy week. Your family will love it every time!

name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Maria Bianchi
description: This Classic Spaghetti Carbonara recipe brings a rich, creamy, and easy Italian classic to your table in under 30 minutes. Perfect for a comforting dinner.

name: Hearty Vegetable Soup
author: Emily Watson
description: Cozy up with a bowl of this Hearty Vegetable Soup. Loaded with fresh veggies and simmered in a flavorful broth, it's the perfect meal for chilly nights.
